name: Food Stranding
description:
An incredibly dynamic and exciting game for a food delivery man against a maddened crowd of customers, shoot enemies every second, move and Dodge, throw explosive tomatoes, buy upgrades and hold out until the very end!

Food Stranding-2d shooter with platforming elements, shoot waves of enemies, change weapons, buy new ones, shoot boxes with bonuses, each wave presents new difficulties.

Features of the game:
- Hardcore
- Music
- Beautiful Pixel-Art
